array.name: CREATE_TABLE_SQL
array.item: create table if not exists UserInfo(Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement,UserId integer,Name text,Gender integer,HeadPortraitPath text,DepartmentId text,AddTime text,DepartmentName text,ParentDepartmentId integer,WorkNo text,Username text,UserType text,Password text)

create table if not exists DirsInfo(Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement,DirId integer,DirName text,DepartmentId integer,ParentId integer,IsTopestDir text not null DEFAULT false,CreateTime text,LastModifyTime text,CreatorId integer,IsDeleted text not null DEFAULT false,IsCommon text not null DEFAULT false)

create table if not exists FileInfo(Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement ,FileName text, FileInfoId integer,FileDirectoryId integer,SystemUserId integer,LastModifyTime text,IsDeleted text not null DEFAULT false,Extension text,Size integer,Path text,UploadTime text,FileIsDeleted text not null DEFAULT false,HashCode text,DepartmentId integer,IsCommon text not null DEFAULT false,LocalPath text,IsLoad integer)

create table if not exists DirectoryInfo(Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY autoincrement ,DirectoryName text, DirectoryId integer,DirectoryType text,Extension text,IsDeleted text not null DEFAULT false,Isload text not null DEFAULT false,Path text,LocaPath text,MemuId integer,IsCommon text not null DEFAULT false)
create table if not exists NotePad(Id integer PRIMARY KEY autoincrement,UserName text,Title text,Content text,Time text)
